name: BatZ - Old-School Arcade Game
blurb: This is a game for arcade game fans, so we want to make it with arcade game fans! In this game you get to kill bats, lots of BatZ!

rewards.reward: Your kindness is rewarded with a sweet new BatZ game, entry edition, for your smartphone and also for you to offer a copy to your best friend or loved one.

EARLY BIRDS Half Price. Help us get started! You get a sweet new BatZ game, entry edition, for your smartphone and a second copy for you to offer someone else. Also, as a special OFFER: you will also get a BatZ fan-sticker.
Your kindness is rewarded with a sweet new BatZ game, lite version, for your smartphone and also for you to offer a copy to your best friend or loved one.
Your awesome kindness is rewarded with a sweet new BatZ game, full edition, for your smartphone and also for you to offer a copy to your best friend or loved one.

Your awesome kindness is rewarded with a sweet new BatZ game, full edition, for your smartphone and also for you to offer a copy to your best friend or loved one. And you will also get a BatZ fan-sticker.

You Rock! Your selflessness kindness is rewarded with a sweet new BatZ game, full edition, for your smartphone and also for you to offer a copy to your best friend or better half. And you will also get a BatZ fan-sticker! If you so wish you may also get credited in the credits page of BatZ.

You're wonderful and we'd like to do something wonderful for you, you will get both the full edition BatZ for you and your loved one, you will also get two stickers! If you so wish you may also get credited in the credits page of BatZ.

Wow, I can't believe it, support at this level, will get you both the full edition BatZ for you and your loved one, you will also get two metallic silver stickers! If you so wish you may also get credited in the credits page of BatZ.

Wow, you are a epic patron, support at this level, will get you both the full edition BatZ for you and your loved one, you will also get two metallic gold stickers! If you so wish you may also get credited in the credits page of BatZ.

My jaw will drop, you are epic beyond all expectations, support at this level, will get you both the full edition BatZ for you and your loved one, you will also get two metallic gold stickers! If you so wish you may also get credited in the credits page of BatZ. You will also get a signed sketch from our great artist Mario Alvari\u00f1o, reponsible for all Batz graphics or a Batz T-Shirt if you prefer.

You are surely a special patron who deserves a level of commitment from all the BatZ team which will teach you, or whom you so wish may participate, to code your own game. This includes shipment of the base project which will get you started on building your own game like BatZ. It also includes remote Skype and instructional videos.

Special Pack: You are surely a great patron who deserves a level of commitment from all the BatZ team which will teach you, or whom you so wish may participate, to code your own game. This includes shipment of the base project which will get you started on building your own game like BatZ. It also includes remote skype and instructional videos.   It will get you both the full edition BatZ for you and your loved one, you will also get two metallic gold stickers! If you so wish you may also get credited in the credits page of BatZ. You will also get a signed sketch from our great artist Mario Alvari\u00f1o, reponsible for all Batz graphics or a Batz T-Shirt if you prefer.
